script1: You make your way down the road.
All around, you see Pokekids and amateur trainers.
You step into the grass, and suddenly...
script2: You step off the road to walk in the grass.
Lots of mountain climbers are in the area.
In front of you, the grass rustles, and...
script3: You make your way towards the next town.
There are pidgeys in the sky, rattatas on the ground.
